name: ROTCES_C
description:
This is my first finished game.

I started developing games in Oct 2020 in my sparse free time (there's a family to feed...). Working as a physicist (with lots of 3D data, what is quite helpful), so I have some experience with coding and, well, physics.

Living in Nürnberg (Nuremberg), Germany.

The game started as a sandbox to try out different aspects of Unity (aiming at moving targets, homing torpedos, small ships that follow you and attack any enemy in range, particle effects, camera movement, upgrade systems, etc.). It slowly evolved into the game it is today.

Version history

v1.0 – initial release (2021-01-12)
